body:
time for another hotfix
yay

- Fixed 'ghost connection' bug occurring on map resets and disconnects (probably)
- Fixed ground waves always spawning in bottom left corner regardless of obstacles
- Fixed top wave/mission menu not collapsing properly
- Fixed random "{1}" text being displayed for outdated servers
- Fixed many various UI layout issues
- Fixed mobile recipe selection swap
- Added text input copy-paste buttons [Mobile]
name: v4 Build 63 - Alpha
